name: Sub Liminal - Web
description:
Hello and welcome to the web-hosted version of Sub Liminal!
Sub Liminal is a casual score-chase horizontal scroller with a vibe.

I challenged myself to build a game from scratch in a week, and I did it! All assets (minus the fonts used for score tracking) were created by me.

The game was made in Godot <3

See if you can get all the broadcasts and get a crazy high score! Thank you so much for checking it out!

You can download this game for free here:
https://zeflyn.itch.io/sub-liminal
